basic.ethical_notes: Affordable entry point for all users

premium.ethical_notes: Clear value proposition with transparent pricing

api_calls.description: Per API call for external integrations
api_calls.ethical_guidelines: Transparent pricing with usage caps to prevent abuse

data_analytics.ethical_guidelines: Only with user consent and data anonymization

ai_optimization.ethical_guidelines: Focus on user benefit and transparent results

consulting.description: Per hour of AI consulting services
consulting.ethical_guidelines: Value-based consulting focused on user success

ethical_guidelines.data_privacy: Full transparency, user consent, and data protection
ethical_guidelines.pricing_transparency: Clear, fair pricing with no hidden fees
ethical_guidelines.user_welfare: Focus on user success over profit maximization
ethical_guidelines.service_quality: Maintain high service standards regardless of user tier
ethical_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure basic services remain accessible to all users

oversight_mechanisms.regular_reviews: Monthly ethical compliance reviews with crew
oversight_mechanisms.profit_limits: Maximum 30% profit margin to ensure fair pricing
oversight_mechanisms.transparency_reports: Quarterly transparency reports on business practices

quark_restraints.no_data_exploitation: Data use only with explicit consent
quark_restraints.no_price_gouging: Fair pricing based on value delivered
